title: Part A
stimulusHtml:

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned if sets v(t) = 0

1 point is earned for the answer

1 point is earned for the reason

The particle’s rightmost position occurs at time t= π =1.772 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3E86@ .

The particle changes from moving right to moving left at those times t for which v(t) = 0 with v(t) changing from positive to negative, namely at t= π , 3π , 5π MathType@MTEF@5@5@@406B@ (t = 1.772, 3.070, 3.963).

Using x(T)=5+ ∫ 0 T v(t)dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@@44D5@ , the particle’s positions at the times it changes from rightward to leftward movement are:

      T:  0   π       3π     5π x( T ): 5  5.895  5.788  5.752 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGceaqabeaacaqGGa GaaeiiaiaabccacaqGGaGaaeiiaiaabccacaWGubGaaiOoaiaabcca caqGGaGaaGimaiaabccacaqGGaWaaOaaaeaacqaHapaCaSqabaGcca qGGaGaaeiiaiaabccacaqGGaGaaeiiamaakaaabaGaaG4maiabec8a WbWcbeaakiaabccacaqGGaGaaeiiamaakaaabaGaaGynaiabec8aWb WcbeaaaOqaaiaadIhadaqadaqaaiaadsfaaiaawIcacaGLPaaacaGG 6aGaaeiiaiaabwdacaqGGaGaaeiiaiaabwdacaqGUaGaaeioaiaabM dacaqG1aGaaeiiaiaabccacaqG1aGaaeOlaiaabEdacaqG4aGaaeio aiaabccacaqGGaGaaeynaiaab6cacaqG3aGaaeynaiaabkdaaaaa@5EF1@
